description: Rear single storey first floor extension above the existing outrigger.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of 1</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span><br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-a49a557b-7fff-bb7e-9320-01cd84ec03e7"><br></span></p><p>REASON: In the interests of biodiversity.<br></p>

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to commencement of development a sample of the timber cladding&nbsp;</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">and </span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">details of any proposed staining of the timber to the hereby approved extension</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">&nbsp;shall be submitted&nbsp;</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, and shall be maintained as such thereafter.</span><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the building and the surrounding area.<br></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
